RelatedSentence: The city of Albuquerque has issued a health alert due to smoke causing elevated levels of particulate matter .
The city of Albuquerque has issued a health alert due to smoke causing elevated levels of particulate matter .

The alert is in effect from Monday at 9:00 p.m. through Tuesday at 2:00 p.m. The alert is being issued due to satellite images showing smoke from the Skunk Fire in eastern Arizona heading toward the Albuquerque area .
People with asthma or other chronic respiratory disease , heart disease , adults age 65 and over , young children and pregnant women should avoid outdoor activities .
Everyone else should minimize outdoor activities .
Avoid using swamp coolers that can circulate outdoor air inside .
Avoid using swamp coolers that can circulate outdoor air inside .
- Individuals with heart or lung disease should follow their health management plan from their health care provider .
Asthmatic individuals should follow a prescribed asthma management plan .
